metadata.title: USN-4712-1 -- Linux kernel regression
metadata.description: USN-4576-1 fixed a vulnerability in the overlay file system implementation in the Linux kernel. Unfortunately, that fix introduced a regression that could incorrectly deny access to overlay files in some situations. This update fixes the problem.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  Original vulnerability details:   Giuseppe Scrivano discovered that the overlay file system in the Linux  kernel did not properly perform permission checks in some situations. A  local attacker could possibly use this to bypass intended restrictions and  gain read access to restricted files.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4712-1` to fix the vulnerability.
